title: Rescue Volo
content: f you really let Volo try his method, he will knock out one of your eyes and give you a permanent debuff. Volo may give you a fake eye to wear, it removes the debuff and grants See Invisibility as permanent buff. If you want the fake eye buff without losing any approval from Karlach, Lae’zel or Shadowheart, simply put them in your party before talking to Volo, then exit camp.
